src_original: tatra eka upatiṣya aparaśca kolitaḥ /  etau dvau gaṇamukhayau parivrājakau parasparaṃ saṃsthāpanaṃ kṛtavantau /  yadāvayoścaikaḥ prathamamamṛtamadhigacchet tadaparasyārocayitavyam /  (Dutt 2)
tgt_original: 門徒之中，有二高足，一名優波提舍，二名拘律陀。

src_original: atha khalu āyuṣmānaśvajit pūrvāṇhakālasame nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /  adrākṣīdupatiṣyaḥ parivrājako gocarāya prasthitamāyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ rājagṛhe mahānagare piṇḍāya carantaram /
tgt_original: 爾時頞鞞著衣持鉢入城乞食，顏色和悅，諸根寂定，衣服齊整，視地而行。

src_original: dṛṣṭvāsyaitadabhavat /  na me kasyacit pūrvaṃ śramaṇasya vā brāhmaṇasya vānyeṣāṃ vā keṣāṃcin manuṣyabhūtānāmayamevaṃrūpaḥ prāsādikaḥ īryāpa[thaḥ]yathāsya bhikṣoryattvahametamupasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam /  kaste āyuṣman śāstā kaṃ boddiśya pravrajitaḥ kasya vā dharmo rocate /  athopatiṣyaḥ yenāyuṣmānaśvajit tenopasaṃkrāmadupasaṃkramyābhyupetyāyuṣmatāśvajitā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāmupasaṃsṛtya [kānte nyaṣīdat /  ekānte niṣaṇṇa upatiṣyaḥ] parivrājaka āyuṣmantaśvajitametadavocat /
tgt_original: 時優波提舍出遊，遙見頞鞞威儀庠序，歎未曾有，待至便問：

src_original: kaste āyuṣman śāstā kaṃ boddiśya pravrajitaḥ kasya vā dharmo rocate /
tgt_original: 『何所法像，衣服反常？ 寧有師宗，可得聞乎？

src_original: śākya[syā]sti suto mahāvratatapāḥ sarvottamo 'smin vaśī  saṃsārārṇavapārago 'pi jagato muktastathā mocakaḥ /  buddho nāma [vibuddho 'nuttara iha duḥ]khārṇavocchoṣakaḥ  taṃ yātaḥ śaraṇaṃ sadāhamamalo dharmastato rocate // Rkp_1.1 //
tgt_original: 『瞿曇沙門是我大師，我等所尊，從而受學！
